user_query: I'm organizing a charity event and I want to promote it through WhatsApp. Get the contacts from the Maytapi WhatsApp tool for my phone id 222222222. Also, check if any of these contacts are registered on WhatsApp using the Whatsapp Scraper tool.

TaskList.description: Retrieve contacts from the Maytapi WhatsApp tool using the specified phone ID.
Check which of the retrieved contacts are registered on WhatsApp using the Whatsapp Scraper tool.
